<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swaggering Initiative](/Feats.aspx?ID=6150) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 166 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You are about to roll initiative.

</column>

---

You swagger readily into any fight. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll and can Interact to draw a weapon. If you are the first to act in combat, you gain panache.
name: Swaggering Initiative
